Design Reference for Wedding Invitation Site
==============================================

The visual reference mockup for `geminy.html` and related pages is documented below.
Refer to the attached image mockup when making any layout, color, or design changes.

Key visual elements from the reference:
- Single-column mobile-first card layout
- Green background (#6B705C) with white card
- Playfair Display font for headings and large text
- Montserrat for body text
- Program section with date, title, horizontal dashed timeline with times above and events below
- Timer section with circular progress rings (days/hours/minutes/seconds)
- Color palette: sage green (#A5A58D), light beige, neutral grays
- Decorative botanical SVG elements (eucalyptus branches)
- Dress code color palette shown as dots
- Location section with photo placeholders

All new design changes should align with this reference mockup.
